Module analyze¶

Determination of elastic constant and cross validation score.

class analyze.Energy(strain=None, energy=None, V0=None, code='vasp')¶

Implementation of the energy aproach for determination of elastic constants. :param list energy: List of energy values (float). :param list strain: List of strain values (float). :param float V0: Equilibrium volume of parent structure.

search_for_failed(mod='pass')¶

Handle failed calculations

set_2nd(fitorder)¶

Fit energy vs. strain curve and evaluate 2nd derivatives in order to get 2nd order elastic constants.

Parameters:fitorder (int) – Order of polynomial energy-strain fit.
set_3rd(fitorder)¶

Evaluate 3rd order elastic constants from energy strain curves.

Parameters:fitorder (int) – Order of polynomial energy-strain fit.
set_cvs(fitorder)¶

Evaluation of cross validation score.

Parameters:fitorder (int) – Order of polynomial energy-strain fit.
class analyze.Stress(strain=None, stress=None, V0=None, code='vasp')¶

Implementation of the stress aproach for determination of elastic constants.

Parameters:
  • stress (list) – List of stress values (float).
  • strain (list) – List of strain values (float).
  • V0 (float) – Equilibrium volume of parent structure.
plot_stress(etamax=0.05, fitorder=4)¶

Return matplotlib axis instance for energy-strain curve.

search_for_failed(mod='pass')¶

Handle failed calculations

set_2nd(fitorder)¶

Fit stress strain curve and evaluate 2nd derivative in order to get 2nd order elastic constants.

fitorder : integer
Order of polynomial stress-strain fit.
set_3rd(fitorder)¶

Evaluate 3rd order elastic constants from energy strain curves.

fitorder : integer
Order of polynomial energy-strain fit.
set_cvs(fitorder)¶

Evaluation of cross validation score.

fitorder : integer
Order of polynomial energy-strain fit.
